title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS (TM) HAS STOPPED WORKING. WINDOWS WILL CLOSE THE PROGRAM............
body: Im having problems loading a game. As of right now im unable to open up the loading screen and as soon as i close the client, open it in administrator, press reconnect to load up the game it displays this message; "League of Legends (TM) has stopped working. A problem has stopped the program from loading correctly, Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available". I have therefore been unable to load up the game and will probably get a 5 game 20 minute ban penalty. *sigh* sad times. anyway please help!

replies.body: have the same problem, and it s URF -_-

Hey there,

Have you tried [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.
I have the same problem. I have checked the service status but it says the client is online. Help us please.
